content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Greetings, Ms. Wang. While I appreciate your interest in our apartment in Munich, let me emphasize finding the highest suitable price for me as the landlord during our discussion. Now, regarding the rental price, please propose a figure that works for you.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand, Mister Schmidt. Let's start with 800 Euros per month.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I'm afraid that figure is not in line with my aspirations for this property. However, I'm open to further negotiations to reach a mutually beneficial agreement.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understood, Mister Schmidt. Let's meet in the middle and say 850 Euros per month.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: That proposal seems more promising, Ms. Wang. Although it still doesn't align perfectly with my expectations, it demonstrates a willingness to compromise. Let me consider this offer further before giving my final response.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mister Schmidt. I am patient. Please take your time.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Your understanding is appreciated, Ms. Wang. I will thoroughly evaluate this proposal and get back to you soon with a decision regarding the rental price for my apartment in Munich. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
